FILE
  PsiElement(comment)('/*\nThe tree  for a right associatie recursive expression\nwill have the form (COLONCOLON a (COLONCOLON b c))\n*/')
  PsiWhiteSpace('\n')
  ExampleRecursiveExpressionExampleImpl(RECURSIVE_EXPRESSION_EXAMPLE)
    PsiElement(recursive_expression)('recursive_expression')
    PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
    PsiElement({)('{')
    PsiWhiteSpace('\n    ')
    ExampleConsExpressionImpl(CONS_EXPRESSION)
      ExampleIdentifierExpressionImpl(IDENTIFIER_EXPRESSION)
        PsiElement(LIDENT)('a')
      PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
      PsiElement(::)('::')
      PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
      ExampleConsExpressionImpl(CONS_EXPRESSION)
        ExampleIdentifierExpressionImpl(IDENTIFIER_EXPRESSION)
          PsiElement(LIDENT)('b')
        PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
        PsiElement(::)('::')
        PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
        ExampleIdentifierExpressionImpl(IDENTIFIER_EXPRESSION)
          PsiElement(LIDENT)('c')
    PsiWhiteSpace('\n')
    PsiElement(})('}')
